about.title: About Arabian Eagle
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner in international travel

whatIsAE.title: What is Arabian Eagle
whatIsAE.description1: Arabian Eagle International is not just a new way to promote your business and services, but it is unique in being, in fact, the first card company specialized in serving travelers from the Arabian Peninsula and other Arab countries, thus providing you with the opportunity to reach a wide audience with high income.
whatIsAE.description2: In several areas it is similar to other travel cards, widely used in terms of services and benefits provided to both the cardholder and the supply company. But what differs is that Arabian Eagle International has established and designed its services for one of the world's highest available incomes for each market individually... specifically the Arab world, especially the Arabian Peninsula.
whatIsAE.description3: In recent years, Arabs and immigrants to the Arab world have become frequent international travelers who use hotels and car rental companies more than their counterparts in other geographical regions. In fact, travelers from the Arab world spend more than one hundred and ten billion US dollars per year on travel. This is the market that Arabian Eagle International offers you to promote your own business.
whatIsAE.description4: And you, as a business partner, can benefit from Arabian Eagle's business vision and services provided to our members once you become a partner. All you need to do is give us information about your business, services and offers as a partner, and we will ensure that your business goals and company aspirations will be achieved with business growth that exceeds your expectations.
whatIsAE.description5: The extensive member program and our ability to enter markets has made us one of the best pioneering companies in the travel industry. Our members, who exceed twenty-eight thousand, enjoy a number of services and most of them have been with us since the establishment of our business. By becoming a business partner, you will increase your customer base through our 42,000 members, use our members' marketing care team and our facilities to promote your services. A major step in business development that would normally take years to achieve, you can now accomplish with just a few clicks of a button.
whatIsAE.description6: Arabian Eagle International aims to enhance its services for its affiliated members and increase its business alliances from various countries around the world. Arabian Eagle International has gained the trust and loyalty of its members and keeps its business growth steadfast and strict, but this is what you will also do as a business partner. Arabian Eagle will not benefit from you as a member as much as you will benefit from it.

companyOverview.title: Company Overview
companyOverview.description1: Arabian Eagle International for Tourism Services was established in 1986 to act as a negotiating group on behalf of businessmen and VIPs who travel constantly.
companyOverview.description2: Arabian Eagle International Card is considered a pioneer in the travel industry and is innovative in how to serve and entertain travelers at the lowest possible cost.
companyOverview.description3: Now, with modern technology and the entry of the Internet into homes and offices, Arabian Eagle International has placed all this technology in the hands of members and partners, whether at home or at work and in their offices.
companyOverview.description4: This opportunity is suitable for members and partners to access all travel needs through an advanced technology network. At the same time, they enjoy the unique low cost of traveling to anywhere in the world.
companyOverview.description5: In addition, Arabian Eagle offers its members deals that support services from their own offices or their business partners' offices.
companyOverview.description6: The membership is for people like you, who are considered leaders in international business and the professional community in dealing with and organizing their trips in a comfortable way while reducing trip expenses without compromising the comfort required during travel.
companyOverview.description7: From here we have provided what we can to help the traveler overcome obstacles and avoid annoyance and waste of time and provide you with the best quality of distinguished services for every dollar you spend because it is a matter of great importance in these times of global financial hardship.
companyOverview.description8: Wherever you travel, you can rest assured that a wide range of insurance documents are exclusively dedicated to protecting you and your dependents, and the exclusive international privileges mentioned in this guide will continue to expand to keep pace with your requirements on every trip and all the time without tiring from those serving you at the Arabian Eagle International management or any of the companies cooperating with us to provide their services internationally.
companyOverview.description9: Besides this, you can contribute to achieving this by submitting your suggestions so that we can provide the best way to help all customers at Arabian Eagle International by spreading the word to your friends and travel partners.
companyOverview.description10: This will lead to expanding membership and increasing negotiating power, which in turn means increasing and improving benefits.

stats.title: Key Information
stats.marketDesc: Travelers from the Arabian Peninsula and the Arab World

partnership.title: Partnership Opportunities
partnership.subtitle: What is the cost and what are the benefits of joining the Arabian Eagle International Business Development Plan?
partnership.noCost: In fact, there are no costs or financial expenses to join the Arabian Eagle International plan.
partnership.formInstruction: All you have to do is fill out the form and fill in the fields and answer the various questions related to your business and the special services and privileges that can be offered to members and cardholders of Arabian Eagle International and then return it to us at the mentioned address.

benefits.title: What will Arabian Eagle International offer you in return?
benefits.benefit1: Automatic addition of your establishment name with all details in our system
benefits.benefit2: Distribution of your establishment name to all Arabian Eagle International cardholders
benefits.benefit3: Automatic addition to the consulting services list

cta.title: Interested in Joining?
cta.description: If you are interested in joining Arabian Eagle International or require more information, please contact us.

cards.title: Arabian Eagle Cards
cards.subtitle: Choose the card that fits your travel needs

basic.name: Basic Card
basic.feature2: Up to 50% discount on hotel rates

silver.name: Silver Card
silver.feature2: Up to 65% discount on hotel rates

gold.name: Gold Card
gold.feature2: Up to 75% discount on hotel rates

intro.title: Arabian Eagle International
intro.subtitle: Not just a new way to promote your business and services, but truly unique

membership.title: Membership Card
membership.description: Arabian Eagle VIP membership, issued by Arabian Eagle International for Tourism Services, provides clients with the highest level of services, not only financial savings, but also makes their travels easier and more convenient.

priorityPass.title: Priority Pass Card
priorityPass.description: For the comfort of Arabian Eagle International cardholders during their travels, arrangements have been made with Priority Pass to grant all Arabian Eagle International customers the international Priority Pass card to ensure their entry to 850 business lounges in international airports in more than 400 cities and 120 countries around the world, regardless of travel class or airline.

partners.title: Arabian Eagle Partners Card
partners.subtitle: The Best Way to Reduce Your Shopping Expenses
partners.description: Make shopping enjoyable by using the Arabian Eagle Partners Card - Super Saver. It gives you a wide range to choose from among many shopping centers, stores, supermarkets, restaurants, clothing stores and premium car rental companies, all at your fingertips for a full year that you get for free when you obtain the Arabian Eagle International Card.

mastercard.title: Arabian Eagle International MasterCard
mastercard.description: The Arabian Eagle card works like any other credit card, except that you alone determine how much you spend through your pre-deposit. Now you can easily order your own Arabian Eagle International MasterCard through our website, as the Arabian Eagle International MasterCard gives you the freedom to shop wherever you want online and at points of sale and stores around the world.

priorityPass.title: Arabian Eagle Priority Pass Membership
priorityPass.subtitle: The Largest Independent Global Program
priorityPass.description: This is the largest independent global program enabling all Arabian Eagle customers to avoid the noise of crowded airports by accessing more than 850 VIP lounges in international airports around the world, making your waiting times at airports full of luxury, calm and peace of mind until boarding time. You will enjoy access to lounges wherever you want, regardless of travel class or the airline you are traveling with.

howToUse.title: How to Use Priority Pass
howToUse.step1: Before traveling, travelers can view lounges in the country they are traveling to by searching the directory available on the website
howToUse.step2: Upon arrival, present your card to the reception staff at the selected lounge
howToUse.step3: A lounge staff member will be pleased to provide their services and direct you to what each traveler needs until boarding time
howToUse.step4: Cardholders will enjoy complimentary refreshments, newspapers, television. In addition, there is access to business facilities including telephone, fax, conference services, and internet

peaceAndCalm.title: Peace and Calm
peaceAndCalm.description: Airports are crowded places that create stress and discomfort. The best way to get rid of that stress is to enter one of the luxurious lounges while waiting for your flight. Priority Pass membership allows you to enjoy access to these lounges and benefit from their services when traveling at any time, regardless of your flight class or the airline you deal with

worldwide.title: Lounges Around the World
worldwide.description: We have many business lounges, so you can access more than 850 lounges in more than 120 countries and more than 400 cities, including the most important airports in the Middle East, especially airports in Saudi Arabia and the Arabian Gulf

features.title: Available Lounge Services
features.feature3: Use of telephone, fax, and conference services
features.feature6: Entry regardless of ticket class or airline

companion.title: Companion Access
companion.description: This distinguished service is not just for you, but for companions with you such as family members, friends, or any of your relatives, and they enjoy the same mentioned benefits for a nominal fee of $27 USD, which is not much considering those privileges

keyAccess.title: Key to VIP Lounge Access Worldwide
keyAccess.description: Arabian Eagle International Card is the key to accessing VIP lounges worldwide, making your waiting times at airports full of luxury, calm, and peace of mind until boarding time

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive travel solutions for our members

hotelDiscounts.title: Hotel Price Discounts
hotelDiscounts.description: Special discounted prices with discounts of more than 50% up to 75% on room rates in a large selection of international hotels, which are considered less than half the value of the regular prices for those hotels.

freeBooking.title: Free Booking Services at International Hotels
freeBooking.description: By contacting the nearest Arabian Eagle International office, members can benefit from free booking services at all hotels

vipPrivileges.title: VIP Privileges & Fastest Hotel Check-in
vipPrivileges.description: Arabian Eagle International completes all hotel registration procedures on behalf of the member to relieve them from the hassle of filling out forms. It also allows them to enjoy free premium services provided to VIPs, which are usually only granted after paying their fees

carRentalDiscounts.title: International Car Rental Company Discounts
carRentalDiscounts.description: Arabian Eagle International membership holders enjoy special discounted prices from several international car rental companies worldwide

freeEmail.title: Free Email from Arabian Eagle
freeEmail.description: Each Arabian Eagle member, after paying the subscription fee, receives a free email account

newsletter.title: Free Newsletter
newsletter.description: Arabian Eagle International sends a regular newsletter to all members containing interesting topics and articles that cater to travelers' interests, as well as additional news and information about the company

cardServices.title: Services Provided by Arabian Eagle International Card
cardServices.subtitle: Excellent Services for All Arabian Eagle International Cardholders
cardServices.intro: We are pleased to provide our services to all our customers, making all services related to travel and tourism programs and worldwide car rental rates accessible to them, granting them very special benefits. These services will be exclusively for all Arabian Eagle International cardholders of all types and levels, without exception

travelConsulting.title: Travel Consulting Services
travelConsulting.description: Arabian Eagle International provides its members with comprehensive information and answers to any inquiries related to travel, tourism programs, ticket booking, hotel reservations, car rentals, etc., for all business trips and short or long vacations, from its offices around the world

otherServices.title: And Also Other Services
otherServices.description: Arabian Eagle Tourism Services management works to provide the best services to its customers to benefit and enjoy all these advantages and special services provided with the latest current technology via the Internet to obtain all information and facilities during their international trips with other privileges

hotelBookings.title: Hotel Bookings & Discounts
hotelBookings.description: Access to 1,145,000+ hotels worldwide with discounts up to 75% from main rates. Special member rates available.

loungeAccess.title: Airport Lounge Access
loungeAccess.description: 850+ VIP lounges in major airports across 120+ countries. Enjoy premium amenities regardless of your airline.

carRentals.title: Car Rental Discounts
carRentals.description: Save up to 30% on car rentals for all your travels. Available worldwide with major rental companies.

mastercard.title: Arabian Eagle MasterCard
mastercard.description: Prepaid debit card with controlled spending and special member privileges.

join.title: Join Arabian Eagle
join.subtitle: Start saving on your travels today

intro.title: Register Now
intro.description: Apply now to register and receive your membership number and password to access and enjoy the services provided by Arabian Eagle International Tourism Services

pricing.title: Subscribe Now for Only $400 USD
pricing.description: Yes, it's true!!! The subscription fee is only $400 USD. It's a small amount compared to the benefits and services offered to you as a member of Arabian Eagle International Tourism Services

hotelDiscounts.title: Get 50% to 75% Discount on Hotel Prices and More
hotelDiscounts.description: Save more than 50% to 75% on basic room rates at 1,145,000 hotels worldwide. You can also get discounts from car rental companies

subscribeToday.title: Subscribe Today
subscribeToday.description: Get discounts up to 75% off basic room rates. Hotel discounts... 50% to 75% off hotel prices at 1,145,000 hotels worldwide

feelComfortable.title: You'll Feel Comfortable Knowing the Discount is More Than 50% and Up to 75%
feelComfortable.description: On basic room rates at 1,145,000 hotels worldwide, including internationally renowned hotels known to all travelers and newly built hotels around the world at various levels and service quality according to traveler needs

carRental.title: Discounts on International Car Rental Companies
carRental.description: Arabian Eagle International membership holders enjoy special discounted rates from several international car rental companies worldwide

q1.question: What is the cost and what are the benefits of joining the Arabian Eagle partner program?
q1.answer: In fact, there are no upfront financial costs for your company to join the Arabian Eagle International partnership program. All you have to do is complete the form on the website, answering various questions about your business and the special services and privileges you can offer to Arabian Eagle International members, then simply click the submit button

q2.question: What will Arabian Eagle International do for you?
q2.answer: Once you have joined Arabian Eagle International, your company will be automatically registered in the tourist directory with complete details, and your name will be circulated to all members as a new company where they can use their various cards. At the same time, you will be included in the travel consulting listings
